message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper focuses on designing a CNN-based network for magnifying text in natural scene images, which involves tasks such as character erasing, character extraction, and image synthesis. These tasks are all related to computer vision (CV) and image processing, which suggests that cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in artificial intelligence (AI) research (cs.AI). The training and evaluation of the network also involve measuring similarity between images, which is a common task in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of datasets such as ICDAR2013 and Flickr, which are commonly used in information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP) research (cs.IR, cs.CL).
